name: k6-multi-load-tests
description: Project of load tests with K6

scripts.k6Node1: npm run fakeUserLogin & npm run fakeProductToCart
scripts.k6Node3: npm run JsonplaceholderGetPost & npm run JsonplaceholderDelPost
scripts.fakeProductToCart: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/fakestore/fakestore_product_to_cart.js $OUTPUT
scripts.fakeAddNewUser: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/fakestore/fakestore_new_user.js $OUTPUT
scripts.fakeUserLogin: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/fakestore/fakestore_user_login.js $OUTPUT
scripts.JsonplaceholderGetPost: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/jsonplaceholder/jsonplaceholder_get_post.js $OUTPUT
scripts.JsonplaceholderDelPost: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/jsonplaceholder/jsonplaceholder_del_post.js $OUTPUT
scripts.JsonplaceholderSimulatePost: ENV=$npm_config_env STRATEGY=$npm_config_strategy TOKEN=$npm_config_token K6_NO_USAGE_REPORT=true k6 run src/scenarios/jsonplaceholder/jsonplaceholder_simulate_user_post.js $OUTPUT
